resources.string: The download file is too large
It is necessary to determine the main leader, who will be the first, top element of the organizations structural diagram:
After selecting an employee from the first list, enter the name of his position, and select his immediate supervisor from the second list of employees:

For vacation time or for any other reason, you can assign a group of employees to another manager. To do this, select the current leader, in the list of his subordinates, select the employees to be moved, and select a new leader for them

The selected employee ceases to be associated with the immediate supervisor, and for everyone for whom he was the immediate supervisor, if necessary, establish a new immediate supervisor, otherwise they will not be visible on the structural diagram (since they will be tied to an employee who does not have a position in the diagram):
Controllability of the plans of subordinates
(All scheduled group time for the period / Number of employees)

Select the duration of the work
Select the user to be deleted
To remove a group, contact us: \n com.astudio.office@gmail.com
Enter a description for the question:
Too many requests, please try again later
SMS should come within a minute, if not received:
Enter the code from the letter
The name should be no more

List of tasks: 
Tasks are divided into three types: 
INCOMING - tasks created by another group member for us, 
OUTCOMING - tasks created by us for another group member , 
GENERAL - tasks created by other members of the group, and not for us. Each task can have three states: 
ACTIVE - not completed and not canceled task, 
COMPLETED - completed task, 
CANCELED - not completed, temporarily canceled task. 
In each list of tasks, it is possible to make a selection based on the status of tasks using the drop-down menu above the list of tasks. 

To view a detailed description of a task, tap the selected task line in the task list. To return to the task list - select the Back arrow-shaped icon at the top of the application. 

Creating a new task: 
To create a new task, click on the floating button in the lower right corner of the task list. 

List refresh: 
The task list is automatically synchronized with the entire group every 15 minutes, provided that the application is active. The status of the last update is displayed in a notification in the phone notification bar Also, the list will be automatically synchronized if a new task appears in the group. To update manually, on the screen of any task list, drag the list down by touching until the loading indicator appears. Alternatively, in the application menu, select Refresh data . 
Depending on the mobile device, the operation of the application in the background may be limited by the operating system, so that the data is guaranteed to be up-to-date - in the application settings, enable "Autostart" or similarly remove restrictions on background operation.

Viewing and managing a task: \n - tasks created by us can be managed - change status, delete. To transfer a task to the status \"completed\" or \"canceled\", click on the corresponding icon in the task description or in the application menu. A canceled task can be returned to the active status. A completed or canceled task can be deleted, this task will be deleted for the entire group. \nTasks not created by us are available only for viewing.

Creating a task: \n - in the drop-down list, select a group member for whom the task is being created, by clicking on the date line - select the desired deadline for the task, enter the task description in the task description field. After filling in all the fields, click on the confirmation icon in the form of a checkmark at the top of the application. \nTo return to the previous screen without creating a task, select the Back arrow-shaped icon at the top of the application.
Group statistics: \n The sum of the tasks created for the period (month) is made up of completed, canceled, active (unfulfilled) tasks.

Adding a user: 
 - enter his full name in the format: Surname, name, his phone number, in the format: + 7XXXXXXXXX, confirm the entry. 
In case of successful addition, a pop-up message will appear containing the login and password of the created user, transfer them to him, or confirm the sending in sms by clicking the "Yes" button. Then you can return to adding the next user. 

Removing a user: 
 - to remove a user from the group, select the user to be removed from the drop-down list, confirm the action. When a user is deleted, the tasks created by him are also deleted. 

Change of administrator: 
 - each group has a single administrator who has the ability to manage the group (add, delete users in the group). To change the administrator, the current administrator must: activate the link "Transfer administrator rights" in the "Group management" section, select the user appointed by the new administrator in the list of users that appears, confirm the action. Then select "Update data" in the application menu for the new administrator.

Enter the group: 
 - enter the phone number in the appropriate field, in the format: +7ХХХХХХХХХ; 
 - enter the password previously received from the group administrator in the corresponding field; 
 - click the "Login" button. 

Password recovery: 
 - if you were a member of the group, but the password was lost, then follow the link "Retrieve password" to go to the password recovery screen. 

Creating a new group: 
 - to create a new group, follow the link "Create a new group", go to the corresponding screen. 

Application Help is present in every section and is available through the menu at the top of the application.

Creation of a group: 
 - fill in the field "Organization name", up to 20 characters, enter the full name of the group administrator, in the format: Surname, name., his phone number, in the format: +7XXXXXXXXX, confirm the entry, save the login (phone number) and password for further entering the group. 

To return to the previous screen without creating a group, select the Back arrow-shaped icon at the top of the application.

User rating: 
 The user's rating is calculated based on his activity. 
 Creating a task, accepting a completed task - increases the rating. Completing tasks set by other users will further increase the rating. Canceling previously created tasks - decreases the rating. The user level increases when the rating is reached to the required value. 
 Working with tasks for yourself - does not affect the rating.
Help with the application is present in every section and is available through the menu at the top of the application.
